doc.field: San Francisco International Poetry Festival in Civic Center, San Francisco. sfipf.org A roll of Fujifilm Superia X-TRA 400 shot in a Pentax K1000 at ISO 320. Some exposures are red tinged because I dropped my camera and it popped open before my film was rewound, whoops!
